title: Week 18 CFL Picks: Eskimos take aim at division lead against Roughriders

Keep me logged in The Edmonton Eskimos’ win streak coincides with quarterback Mike Reilly’s return as the starter after suffering a knee injury in the season-opening loss to the Toronto Argos.
